channel.title: Harbor on Container Registry
channel.description: Recent content in Harbor on Container Registry

item.title: Harbor Release 2.2.0
item.description: Harbor 2.2.0 was just released and comes with some very interesting features. This post walks you through the newly added features and changes explaining the capabilities. Since the last release of v2.1.0 in September 2020, eleven contributors made 41 changes and resolved 189 issues. New Features Robot Accounts Robot accounts got a complete revamp, now supporting robot accounts on system level. System-level robot accounts can access to multiple projects. Robot accounts gained 6 more permissions, permitting now robot accounts to delete resources and manage tags and trigger vulnerability scans.
